article.title: General Dynamics To Provide Submarine Weapons Control Systems
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: General Dynamics has been awarded a $152,818,728 cost-plus-incentive fee contract for fiscal year 2010 and fiscal year 2011 for production and deployed systems support for the United States and United Kingdom SSBN fire control system and SSGN Attack Weapon Control System, including training and support equipment.
